Name: New York Minute
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon and orange zests, and coffee beans.
EXPRESS lemon and orange zest twists over cocktail and discard.
Review: Honeyed tequila and aromatic maraschino with complex herbal vinous notes.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2014 at Duck & Cover , Copenhagen, Denmark, but originally created by Luke Whearty at Der Raum, Melbourne.
Nutrition: One serving of New York Minute contains 201 calories
